page.title: 16EMPLOYMENT IN SWINDERBY.
page.content: In 1985 many people go to Lincoln and Newark to work in factories, offices, schools, hospitals or work locally on farms or at RAF.Swinderby. {Private firms}in this area are:- 1)Glasby's{Garage}High Street,built in 1970,a pit and extra garage were added in 1979. The owner and his assistant repair cars, vans and lorries. 2)John Mason, the{Builder,}Manor Road, has built many houses and The Garage. He also restores houses and hotels. 3)Bull's{Garage,}A46, was established in 1928 and moved to its present site in 1939. Mr.Bull's family now only supply motor fuel and accessories. 4){Newspaper delivery service. The Village is divided into 3 rounds in the morning and 2 rounds at night. On Friday nights or Saturday mornings the cost of the papers plus a delivery charge is collected.
